title: 牛頭角分區軍裝巡邏小隊男警員初步確診

replies.msg:
【一名男警員初步確診2019冠狀病毒病】
【A Male Police Constable Preliminarily Tested Positive for COVID-19 】

一名駐守牛頭角分區軍裝巡邏小隊的23歲男警員初步確診2019冠狀病毒病。他的家人於近日（12月21日）感到不適，並由救護車送往醫院，經初步測試後於昨日（12月22日）得知對2019冠狀病毒病呈陽性反應。其後該名警員亦於昨日被送往醫院進行初步測試，發現同樣對2019冠狀病毒病呈陽性反應。該名警員於過去14日沒有外遊記錄，與公眾接觸期間有配戴口罩。他最後一日上班日為12月21日。

警方高度關注事件，並有以下訊息：

一）在等候衞生署進一步評估及建議前，與該警員可能有緊密接觸的警務人員及文職人員，均獲安排接受檢疫及病毒檢測；

二）警方會派員清潔及消毒該名警員的相關工作地方；

三）警方亦經常提醒同事注意個人衞生，減少社交接觸，減低傳染風險，如有任何不適，須立即呈報並求醫；以及

四）警方會靈活調派人手，確保相關服務不受影響。

警方將會繼續與衞生署保持緊密聯繫，主動提供該名警員的近日工作記錄和執勤表等資料，以及安排相關密切接觸者進入檢疫中心接受檢疫。

A 23-year-old male Police Constable who is posted to the Patrol Sub-unit of Ngau Tau Kok Division, preliminarily tested positive for the Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19). Feeling unwell on Monday (21 December), the police officer's family member was escorted by ambulance to the hospital and was preliminarily tested positive for COVID-19 yesterday (22 December). The police officer was later escorted to the hospital and was also tested positive for COVID-19 yesterday. He has no travel history in the past 14 days and he wore face mask while coming in contact with members of the public during his tour of duty. His last working day was 21 December.

The Police are highly concerned and have the following messages:

(1) Before further assessment by the Centre for Health Protection, all Police officers and civilian staff who might have been in contact with the officer concerned have been arranged to undergo COVID-19 test;

(2) All facilities in the office concerned have been sterilised;

(3) All officers have been reminded to reduce social contact to minimise risks of infection, and to pay attention to physical health. If feeling unwell, they should consult a doctor and report the case immediately;

(4) The Police will deploy resources flexibly to ensure provision of policing services of the areas concerned remains unaffected.

Police are highly concerned about the case and will maintain close communication with the DoH and provide assistance in tracing the pathology, by proactively providing information such as the duty record and roster of the officer concerned.

Arrangements will be made for close contacts to be conveyed to quarantine centres to undergo quarantine.

希望中既係武漢肺炎。英國。改
最緊要人冇事 長命百歲
